name: NSURL.BookmarkCreationOptions
desc: Options used when creating bookmark data.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Initializes a new bookmark creation options structure.

items.name: static var minimalBookmark: NSURL.BookmarkCreationOptions
items.desc: Specifies that a bookmark created with this option should be created with minimal information.

items.name: static var suitableForBookmarkFile: NSURL.BookmarkCreationOptions
items.desc: Specifies that the bookmark data should include properties required to create Finder alias files.

items.name: static var withSecurityScope: NSURL.BookmarkCreationOptions
items.desc: Specifies that you want to create a security-scoped bookmark that, when resolved, provides a security-scoped URL allowing read/write access to a file-system resource.

items.name: static var securityScopeAllowOnlyReadAccess: NSURL.BookmarkCreationOptions
items.desc: When combined with the withSecurityScope option, specifies that you want to create a security-scoped bookmark that, when resolved, provides a security-scoped URL allowing read-only access to a file-system resource.
